startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

id.description: The list of priority IDs. To include multiple IDs, provide an ampersand-separated list. For example, `id=2&id=3`.

projectId.description: The list of projects IDs. To include multiple IDs, provide an ampersand-separated list. For example, `projectId=10010&projectId=10111`.

priorityName.description: The name of priority to search for.

onlyDefault.description: Whether only the default priority is returned.

expand.description: Use `schemes` to return the associated priority schemes for each priority. Limited to returning first 15 priority schemes per priority.
